Package utils.access

Package containing the RecordManager and query engine.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    APS
    abstract interface for an access permission set
    DBRecord  
    EncryptedAPS
    wrapper around the raw data of an access permission set.
    EncryptionUtils
    utility functions for encrypting and decrypting data
    Feature
    abstract super-class for additional features of the query engine
    Feature_AccountQuery
    queries made to the access permission set of a user also query his other access permission sets based on the query parameters.
    Feature_BlackList
    access permission sets may contain a blacklist of record IDs that are never contained in this APS.
    Feature_ConsentRestrictions  
    Feature_Consents  
    Feature_ContentFilter
    filter records by format
    Feature_Documents  
    Feature_Expiration  
    Feature_FormatGroups
    filter records by group. add group information to record while querying
    Feature_Indexes  
    Feature_InMemoryQuery
    query a preselected list of records in memory
    Feature_Prefetch  
    Feature_ProcessFilters  
    Feature_QueryRedirect
    allows access permission sets not only to have a list of records but also a link to another APS with a filter-query
    Feature_SortAndLimit  
    Feature_Streams
    organizes records into "streams". these are access permission sets that contain only records of one type.
    Feature_UserGroups  
    Feature_Versioning  
    IndexManager
    Manages indexes on encrypted data records.
    IndexPseudonym  
    Query
    parameters for a single query for records
    RecordComparator  
    RecordConversion  
    RecordLifecycle
    Functions supporting the record lifecycle
    RecordManager
    Access to records.
    VersionedDBRecord  

Package utils.access Description

Package containing the RecordManager and query engine.
